title: The 600th Episode
description:
On our 600th Episode, Sean Patton, Tracey Segarra, and Laura Bearing share stories about an emotional night in a strip club, a marriage at a low point, and a family's custody battle. We also hear from lots of RISK! fans celebrating what the show means to them.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Sean Patton, Tracey Segarra, Laura Bearing, kevin allison, Jozem, Bob James, xRGB, FKJ & Bas, Dizzy Gillespie, Bob Schneider, Art Blakey & The Jazz Messengers, Miles Davis, Jeff Barr, Taj Easton)
